amendment.description: An amendment numbered 22 printed in House Report 115-785 to increase funding for the Sexual Assault Special Victims' Counsel Program by $2 million for sexual assault prevention and response programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Esty (CT) amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A032) offered by Ms. Esty (CT).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Esty (CT) amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
